articles.author: Wes Davis
articles.title: OnePlus 12 leaks show a bigger battery and faster charging - The Verge
articles.description: Leaked specs for the OnePlus 12 show a larger battery, upgraded cameras, and a jump to the latest Qualcomm chipset are due for the phone later this year.
articles.content:
